TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An unexpected medical problem that happens during treatment with a drug or other therapy. Adverse effects do not have to be caused by the drug or therapy, and they may be mild, moderate, or severe. Also called adverse event.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Problema médico inesperado que sucede durante el tratamiento con un medicamento u otra terapia. La causa de los efectos adversos no es necesariamente el medicamento o el tratamiento; ellos pueden ser leves, moderados o graves. También se llama fenómeno adverso.
